Not too long ago I found my sister after she killed herself and the bedtime stories have been a big help to distract me enough to sleep. Again I really do enjoy the app however, the bulk of everything is locked and as a new college student I don‚Äôt have the extra money to pay for a subscription (moreso for the meditations my therapist tells me is good for me) but I never seem to get through the first story before I‚Äôm asleep dreaming of lavender fields. Keep up the good work. Thank you
title: Thank you

review: Calm is a multifaceted app, with a ridiculous amount of content. I‚Äôve meditated for years, and I can tell you even if your an advanced meditator it‚Äôs great as a healthy reminder. The soundscapes, music, and calm kiddo section makes teaching meditation to your kids super easy aswell. While I‚Äôve been out of commotion with Lymes Disease, this has been a god send to just prompt my sappy when in bed, and can‚Äôt move it‚Äôs downrite lovely! I will spend the 60 bucks to purchase the whole app very soon! Cheers, and enjoy.
title: Worth your time and money

review: This helps me so so so much! I can never sleep or focus and this has helped me do both! I also have really bad stress and anxiety it has helped calm me down really well! Its like free therapy sessions, there are some you have to purchase but there are also a variety of free ones too which are the ones I use. I dont think theres anything I dislike even the people talkings voices are calming this is just a perfect app I have 100% no dislikes or complaints! Great job whoever created this you have helped me a lot!!

I download this app originally for meditation and spa. It‚Äôs hard to let the bebe sleep daytime, and he was getting crazy. I played ‚Äúsleep music‚Äù hope it could calm him down, but I didn‚Äôt expect it would work. I left the bedroom and was doing my stuff. The b√©b√© was no longer crying, and when I came to check him, he had already been asleep. It‚Äôs a magic and saves my life. The app is not designed for children under 4, but it‚Äôs a nice attempt to see whether your baby likes it.
title: Works for my 4 month baby!

review:
We are at a point in time that is too remarkable to fully describe. I suppose all times seem such to many people. Think and recognize who the thinker is and then wonder why am I thinking at all. It brings us to the creator. Thoughtfulness has so many forms the most important of which is to use your thoughts to do the best you can. When you see the world as it is you can only be amazed at the miracles that exist everywhere, always.
Ever moment is eternal....
To love is to be God
title: Selfless.....in search of love.... our creator....

review: I just love this app because it has given me just enough structure to make meditation a regular part of my life. I love the positive messages that are delivered along with the meditations especially in the daily calm. Of course I feel I could do better by meditating longer Or deeper like most people, but I have also learned that just sitting down for meditation has extremely great benefits and itself regardless of how I think I‚Äôm doing. I strongly recommend the Calm app if you‚Äôd like to make  meditation A habit.
title: Finally a meditator

developerResponse: {'id': 7757119, 'body': "Hi there, we do offer a 7 day free trial which will charge your account at the end if not canceled. If you need assistance with this unintended charge, please reach out to support@calm.com and we'd be happy to help you out.", 'modified': '2019-03-15T21:54:44Z'}
review: I‚Äôm a school teacher. I signed up for the app so that I could use it in my classroom. Calm advertises that this app is free for school teachers. I submitted my info, signed up for for free trial, and just received my $70 bill. I wrote a message to calm the day that I submitted my information to receive the Calm app for free, but I still haven‚Äôt heard anything back. I have no qualms with the app itself, however I am very highly annoyed that they‚Äôre charging me for it, when they made it so very clear that it would be free.
title: Not free for teachers?

review: I used simple habit for nearly a year.  The fundamental difference in my experience in the past week is the amount of time for actual meditation that‚Äôs built into each session.  In simple habit the narration is so constant it‚Äôs difficult to simply sit and focus on the breath for awhile.  Calm has a few minutes at a time that are allotted simply for this purpose.  Thus far I have also found the actual narration more conducive to meditation and concentration.  I‚Äôll be going premium on this app.  A definite win.
title: Wonderful

review: I was on the train and noticed all the impending signs of a panic attack. I got off at the next stop (if I‚Äôd had a panic attack on the train it would have had to be delayed and delaying a train in NYC is a cardinal sin) and found a seat on the platform. As I was trying to pull myself together ‚Äî and failing ‚Äî I remembered this app that I hadn‚Äôt used in a while and opened it. I listened to the first mediation for the 21 days of calm and I quickly felt my panic secede. By the end of the meditation I was calmer and felt okay enough to get on the next train. Thanks!
title: Super helpful

review:
This app bookends my day with quiet time and a meditation in the morning and a meditation or sleep story as I drift to sleep. I‚Äôve tried other meditation apps, but Calm provides the perfect blend of music, meditation and sleep stories. It‚Äôs worth every penny and more!

For years, I‚Äôve had difficulty sleeping and thanks to the Calm essential oil spray and a nighttime meditation, more often than not I am able to get a restful night of sleep.  If I do wake up in the middle of the night unable to go back to sleep, I just put on a sleep story and it keeps my mind from spinning.

The number and variety of meditation topics and durations give me just the messages I need no matter what situation I‚Äôm involved.

If you are new to meditation and mindfulness or have been practicing for years, I think you will find benefit from this amazing app. I can truly say my life is enriched by Calm.
title: Life Changing!

developerResponse: {'id': 6051098, 'body': "Hi there, I'm sorry to hear that the current pricing options are not a good fit for you. A lot of factors go into our pricing, and we do not take the decision of how much to charge lightly. We do our best to keep a useful set of content free for users who are unable to subscribe, but ultimately, our subscription prices allow us to continue growing the content (in terms of quantity and quality). Feel free to send any questions or feedback to support@calm.com.", 'modified': '2018-11-22T04:17:48Z'}
review: I wanted to try this out because I saw all the ad rolls on Facebook. Figured it couldn‚Äôt hurt to see what I could get for free before maybe going for a subscription  It gives you one free Sleep Story and two free 5-10 minute mediations (The first of the 7 Days of Calm/Sleep respectively) but other than that, literally nothing else is free and they shove a subscription in your face. And a yearly one at that! Nothing else is even offered. I‚Äôm not paying $60 a year for something I saw barely anything of. Only giving this 2 stars because the one free Sleep Story they had was narrated by Stephen Fry, who can never do wrong. This app could do a lot better at the outset.
title: Hardly any preview functions.

developerResponse: {'id': 6051023, 'body': 'Hi Highline speechie, thanks for the message and I‚Äôm sorry to hear you did not enjoy the app. If you have any additional feedback to help us improve, please send us an email to support@calm.com.', 'modified': '2018-11-22T04:10:13Z'}
review: Before I paid $39/yr for this app (got it on sale) I researched others out there. Calm sounded pretty good!  It‚Äôs not user friendly at all!!  The stories are not very appealing. Some of the voices are kinda creepy. Not calming at all. I hadn‚Äôt used it for awhile. Thought I‚Äôd try it again-it is 4:11am & I‚Äôm still wide awake. When I opened the app all I saw was a picture of a lake with a mountain behind it. When I tap the screen, nothing happens. If I scroll right or left a new ‚Äòcalming picture‚Äô appears. There‚Äôs only 3 different pictures. What a waste!  Would love to get a refund. I remember wishing there was a monthly subscription available. I think there‚Äôs a reason they don‚Äôt offer one-people would cancel after one month!
title: How does this app get rating of 4.8?

review:
Only day 2 and I am feeling better üôèüèºI find it easy to get it done in the early morning when the day is quiet. I am
only doing 10 minutes and after I finish a week successfully I plan to do another 10 min during my lunch dreak - I have no expectations and just going with what I am asked by the practice - I know it is going to bring some clamness as I am already experiencing that. Thank You for making an app that is a must need in today‚Äôs stressful lifestyles
title: Blessing to the one who came up with idea

review: I am really struggling with so many things in my life right now....depression, stress, worry, poor sleep etc. At first I thought I would only use the free version of this app because I thought there was no way I would spend that much money on an app subscription. But after trying out the free features and seeing how it‚Äôs helped me calm down so much, I‚Äôm happy to pay. I look forward to these meditations and already feel calm as soon as I hear the app sounds. Thanks you to the makers of Calm!!!
title: Best Life Strategy ever

review:
I feel a little duped. It shows up as a free app, and I do understand the reasoning for needing to have paid content. However, please be aware that the free version is essentially a mini trial version of the program. You have access to 7 days to calm, the first exercise of a few other programs, the breathing bubble, and sleep stories. 

However, I‚Äôm here for the meditation programs, in particular the anxiety and stress relief programs. 

I have enjoyed the content I have been able use and am considering the year subscription (with a reminder set to cancel it after a year). I think that if the programs work, a year is longer than what you need for guidance unless they continue adding very new and very different content. 

Because of their expectation for you to pay for 90% of their content, I wish they‚Äôd offer a free week trial, because I feel like I‚Äôm shelling out a lot of money for something that I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôll like. 

That said, I
title: Could be great...

review: I have been using this app about one month. I find I look forward each morning to the Daily Calm which always has a little nugget of wisdom to think about. I especially like the bedtime stories to fall asleep to. There is a wide range of soothing background sounds and music. I like the SunsetBeach the most of any ocean background sounds I have ever tried. Just the right rhythm and best of all, a sea gull noise that is faint not intrusive   It has been designed with great care and it shows.
title: Great addition to my day

developerResponse: {'id': 2341179, 'body': "So sorry you're having trouble! A recent iOS update has caused many iPhones to reboot when using apps that utilize local notification settings. Apple has released a fix for this issue, so you should see this resolved if you update to iOS 11.2 on your device.", 'modified': '2018-01-19T03:27:45Z'}
review: I downloaded this app two days ago and absolutely loved the meditations. However immediately after meditating on the second day, my phone started doing this thing where it restarted/crashed every two minutes or so. I didn‚Äôt see the correlation to the app at first, but then I actually went and bought a new phone. When I downloaded and used the app again, my brand new phone started doing it too! I couldn‚Äôt believe it. I had my husband download it just to see and his started doing it too. It didn‚Äôt stop until I removed the app from my phone. Hopefully they‚Äôll get this bug fixed because I really enjoyed the meditations!
title: Love the meditations but...

review: I have 12 grandchildren and they love spending the night at Grandma‚Äôs house.  One of the things they like the most is listening to Mr. Calm !  Even the most wound up child finds the story irresistible and none of them have ever heard the end.  Now that I‚Äôm retired, insomnia isn‚Äôt much of a problem for me, but on those rare occasions that I just can‚Äôt sleep, I prefer Mr. Calm to the adult sleep stories if I really need to get to sleep, right now.   His calm, humorous voice is perfect.
title: Mr. Calm is a family favorite!

review:
I love Calm! It is one of my must-have apps, my favorites are the Sleep Stories and I always look forward to the frequent additions to the collection! 

I do wish I am able to access Sleep Stories through my Watch app and/or download certain sleep stories in advance! This is nice for when I don‚Äôt want to wake up from my phone screen or risk getting distracted again. 

Thank you Calm Team!!! Keep up the great work!!!
title: Watch app suggestion

review: I honestly would have never considered anything like this. I love music and tv in the background. Chaos is life. This was provided through my new job for Mental Awareness Month and I though to myself - OK let‚Äôs see what it‚Äôs all about. I am shocked. I am enjoying the abyssal music. It provides volumes of energy to the room. It has helped me with focusing on my tasks for work and it honestly makes time pass expeditiously.
title: Never thought I would like something like this

review: The calm app is amazing. I have stress and insomnia so I can‚Äôt sleep and the calm app is a great way to get me to sleep. As you first go in the app it asks what your feeling and based off of that, it will show you a variety of options to choose from to help that exact emotion. The Calm app also has backgrounds of calm places and some include sound! The only hiccup is that some sleep podcasts keep me awake. What I was looking for is fictional stories that were calming and zen. But otherwise the calm app helps so much in my everyday life!
title: The Calm app

review: I‚Äôm a middle schooler who is trying to balance sports, school, friends, and family. It‚Äôs been tough for me lately and I saw an ad for this app, I thought it would be worth a shot, and right away after only having it for a few week I already notice a difference in the way I play basketball, and my grades. I 100% recommend this for everyone. When you meditate everything goes away.
title: Trying to balance everything

review: I have been using the Calm app for two years now. When my mind starts racing at the beginning of the day, it helps greatly in putting my emotions aside, calming my body and brain, and starting my day off better. I have also learned some fantastic things that have been life changing from the little lessons at the end. It‚Äôs only 10 minutes. And my days go better when I start my day off with Calm.
title: My days go better

review: I have been listening and learning from calm for a year now and I am a better person to myself. So many things were going on in my head and I never knew I could control the thinking as I do now. Each day I learn from the daily calm the techniques that can make my life more healthy. A healthy body is not enough if the mind is just out of control. Thank you to all at calm but especially Tamara and Jeff. Please keep teaching.
title: A better human

review: Supportive, intentional, thoughtful, informational, educational. The only thing I wish I (or creators)could/would take the birds out of the the soundscapes or have a feature where I could mute the birds in the app. There are birds in just about every soundscape to go to sleep to, it‚Äôs limiting to only be able to use a select few. Thank you for your time and dedication in creating such an accessible universal source for humanity. I hope it stays affordable. üôè
title: Favorite Mindful Support App!

review: Currently during me writing this I‚Äôm in the sixth grade. It‚Äôs rough, it‚Äôs not easy, it feels like to you have to be the ‚Äúbig kid‚Äù but calm has made me realize it‚Äôs ok to be childlike and funny at home, but at school if you tune it down but blare it out occasionally then your rays of sunshine will surely cheer everyone! However my favorite metaphor has been as if we were a tree sustaining the earth, when I planet my feet and smile and breath I feel like I am the tree of life!
title: This helped me overcome rough night(s)

review: I've used the Calm app for years for it's meditations and sleep stories. Calm really helped me through some stressful times in my life. I recently discovered the Daily Move and wanted to tell how much I love it. I already have a stretching routine that I do each morning and this has added a little extra variety. I enjoy Mei's sense of humor and appreciate her gentle guidance and soothing tone. Thanks so much for this wonderful addition to an already terrific app.
title: Love the Daily Move!

review: I first was able to try Calm through an employer subscription offered to me as an employee. It was something that took me some time to make a habit and explore, but I am so glad I did. I have since left the company that offered it and am happy to be a paid subscriber for this level of content that is regularly added and updated. Feedback points: would love more courses, music playlists and scrolling area clips.
title: Worth it

review: I have been using the Calm app for more than five years. Teaching, masterclasses, music, bedtime sleep stories, and focused meditations have helped me through the years and has become a part of my morning daily ritual. The Daily Trip with Jeff Warren has been a balm in many ways to help me grow through lifes challenges. The app is well organized and it is easy to access all the different choices. Highly recommend this app.
title: Wonderful Meditation Teachers

review: While I recognize that many people undoubtedly like Tamara‚Äôs voice, I find it incredibly annoying and New Age woo woo. I wish there were more male voices available as the app is robust with many great features. I bought a discounted yearly subscription to try to make myself get used to Tamara‚Äôs voice. But, instead, I continue to return to my Balance app where I have multiple choices of voices for ALL the features, not just some. I look forward to the day when I can use all of Calm‚Äôs features without having to listen to Tamara.
title: Really don‚Äôt like Tamara Levitt‚Äôs voice!

review: This was recommended to me because I cannot stay asleep. I sleep on average about 4 hours a night. This claims to be a free app; however, the only thing free are the sounds of crickets and a babbling brook. Nothing else seems to be free. Yes there is a free trial but the hassle of remembering to cancel if I don‚Äôt find anything that works for me in 7 days is irritating.  How are we supposed to get a good sample of the things available in just 7 days? Not enough time and I don‚Äôt want the headache of having to remember to cancel before my card is charged. I‚Äôm cheap, I‚Äôll admit it but a two-week trial would be more appealing.  I will likely be deleting the app as if I wanted to hear crickets, I‚Äôd open a window.
title: Crickets

review:
Great app to encourage more stillness in your day - where the majority is used to always moving on to the next. 
Slowly I am seeing myself become less reactive and more responsive from the skills I am building with this app. The skills are open ended and presented in ‚Äòfood for thought‚Äô format. 
I love the ‚Äúradiating energy‚Äù background sound.  
I look forward to contributing more streaks in my own profile.
title: Recenter / ground / slow down / connect to your sensations

review:
I have the full paid version which was gifted to me since I do use another meditation app frequently that I love. I was excited at first to get new options. However I don‚Äôt like Calm, it is very inflexible. Too many things are only narrated by Tamara and for me her voice is annoying. She does virtually all the sleep meditations. Also for me I like to choose shorter meditations. Everything is so long. I don‚Äôt need 30-45 min to go to sleep. Prefer a 10-15 min option. The sleep stories are also very long and more like audiobooks instead of  meditation to me. 

So I do recommend trying the free version first before buying. I won‚Äôt be renewing when my gift expires.
title: Not flexible

review: I really like how many options this app has for breathing exercises. I used one of the breathing exercises when I was feeling stressed and overwhelmed and it really helped me calm down. I also really like how many options there are to help with anxiety,m. I just wish that with as many options there are, more were free so I can a fuller experience. I can see though how this would essentially be relaxation training as a form of treatment for anxiety disorders.
title: Relaxing!

review: I actually really like this app. The sleep stories helped a lot with my insomnia and there are other options for meditation, mental clarity etc. however, with ALL the stories, sessions and albums they have shown on this app, 95% of them are locked and can only be accessed if you sign up to pay 70$ for the year. It was challenging finding a session or story that wasn‚Äôt locked and didn‚Äôt have much options. I believe they help and I‚Äôm debating on paying, I just wish I had more options before deciding.
title: Not much options if you don‚Äôt pay

review:
This app is amazing! It has breathing expertises to help you sleep, or for anxiety. It has calming music, soundscapes, stories for sleep- overall it is amazing! It does require a subscription but it is absolutely worth it!
I have one request for the creators. Would it be possible to add ASMR onto the app? A lot of people fall asleep very easily to ASMR, but not much else, and so I believe it would be a good way to help more people fall asleep easily. Thank you for reading my review, and I truly hope you decide to add ASMR to the app!
title: Positivity and a request

review: I love using this app, but I initially knew that I only wanted to subscribe for about a month (which costs $15) due to how tight expenses are right now during the coronavirus pandemic. This app gives you a 7-day trial, but then afterwards instead of allowing me to choose which option I want for a subscription, it just automatically charged me $60 for a yearlong subscription. I probably could‚Äôve checked sooner, but I assumed that I‚Äôd be given the chance to pick a type of plan instead of being locked in for a year.
title: Charged me $60 after the trial and didn‚Äôt allow me to choose my subscription plan

review: Ummm, this is a good app and all, but the fact that I can‚Äôt access anything other than BEDTIME STORIES without having to have a free trial is RIDICULOUS! Like really? Also, WHAT THE HECK, why only children‚Äôs bedtime stories without it? I mean, I‚Äôm a 7 year old girl and I‚ÄôM the instructor of my Mom when she meditates! I really want you to be more open with your choices. Until then, this rating is still 3 stars. Hmmph! >:( oh, wait never mind! I just saw another rating that says you can access the scenes! :) you get 4 stars though, but BE GREATFUL
title: Ummm,

review: ^^it is , and a lot of people face depression amid all the horrible things happening in the world. This app is great for a deep, analytical thinker, who‚Äôs an optimist but finds it hard to always be happy. This app gives you the gift of fresh perspective. I think it‚Äôd be a total personal investment for myself to subscribe to the year of unlocking the full app, based on what I‚Äôve seen in the free content so far. This app you can meditate and listen to an audiobook all at once, two things I know I should do but don‚Äôt ever do.
title: Perception is reality

review:
Is a 6 Star rating possible? Calm has literally changed my life and my sleep habits significantly. I rely on this app like a family member. Listening to Tamara‚Äôs sleep relaxation and breathing sessions put me to sleep in less than 15 minutes. Nothing and I mean NOTHING has been able to do that! I don‚Äôt know how I‚Äôd cope if this app were to stop existing. 

Only thing I wished the app had was a search feature. That‚Äôs the only thing I can find fault with in this app.
title: 6 Stars

review:
This app has changed my life for the better. I am calmer, happier, more peaceful than I ever have been. I have enjoyed every meditation I've done--but don‚Äôt miss the ‚ÄúHow to Meditate‚Äù series! 

I also really like the "Breathe" meditation. Though it is modifiable, I use it as is to take a moment here and there to still myself, re-center myself, and/or de-stress. It's amazing. 

I also love their sleep sounds and sleep stories. I listen to a sleep story as I go to bed, and, if I wake, I play Thunderstorms, my favorite. On occasion, I just play the sounds to settle down and focus into something. 

Last year I upgraded to the lifetime membership. It was a relief to do so, because I can‚Äôt imagine being without my Calm app. It‚Äôs the best money I ever spent‚Äîand it was on sale! Do yourself a favor and get the full, paid version of Calm; you won‚Äôt regret it.
title: This app has changed my life!

review:
This is the best app I‚Äôve ever purchased. I don‚Äôt go one day without using it at LEAST once. I never thought I could be someone that meditated but I use calm everyday and I‚Äôve even convinced many of my friends to start. I have noticed meditation have an impact on every single area of my life. I‚Äôve been using the app a year and 3 months. I love it. 

If you‚Äôre thinking of meditating and just don‚Äôt know where to start this where to start. 

Update: still using this app and still love every minute.
title: Start.

review:
Tried the night time stories first on American Airlines transatlantic. Would put seat down, pull up blanket and lay head on pillow while listening with Bose earphones to the melodious yet calming voice of Erik Ba. Fell in love listening to the Nordic Train and have had many pleasant hours of sleep. 

When I found this app and it has the Nordic Train- I had to purchase it. There is so much more that is available to discover and loving every minute of the guided mediations; to the sleep stories. 

Kudos for creating such a mindful and healing app!
title: Nordic Train

review: This app has been such a gift for me.  It was recommended to me to help with anxiety and restlessness I was struggling with.  Through the daily mediations and the meditations for specific needs I have developed a practice that has helped immensely.  Additionally, the master classes have led me to more research from experts on topics like happiness.  I have learned so much from this app and feel more fulfilled in general.  I was hoping this app would help -it has not only helped but changed me for the better! Thank you so much Calm creators!!
title: Thank you Calm

review: I have been in the practice of using guided meditations for 5 years. I have been using the Calm App for 3 months now. The daily Calm and special meditations have helped my practice and self turn the corner to a deeper understanding of my presence and others around me. The inventory is vast just as we are and I look forward to each days personal development within myself and in all my interactions and relationships with others. Thank you Tamara ... I am happy even without being able to do a headstand!
title: Calm gets me!

review: It‚Äôs difficult to know how great this app is from the free meditations alone. Like other meditation apps, they bait you with scant free beginner meditations to get you to unlock content that you pay a monthly subscription for. There is very little free content, and what there is is just OK.  In a 12 minute anxiety meditation, the first three minutes is a bunch of beginner blah blah about the benefits of meditation that I already know. Then you get into the meditation part. It is not compelling enough for me to want to pay more. They give you a seven day free trial and then start charging you. Typical free app that is simply a front for a subscription service.
title: Not a lot of free content

review:
I‚Äôve recently had trouble sleeping, and started listening to this app because a friend recommended the Sleep Stories. Listening to those or doing a 10 min relaxing body scan has made a world of difference in my ability to fall asleep, stay asleep and sleep well. Thank you Calm!! 

Ps - The subscription is well worth it. There are endless recordings on the app and more being added constantly. Even if you just use the app for the breath visualizer, it‚Äôs so very worth it.
title: Gave me my sleep back

review:
Hi so I think you should get calm because you probably need it. Especially if you are weird. My favorite story is Michals Sleepy Farm. So you better download this app or I will come to your sleep farm. I will track you down so please get this app because I don‚Äôt want to come to your stinky house. I‚Äôm looking at you bob. Get this app! Thanks for reading this! You probably can‚Äôt. Cause your 7th grade teacher taught you nothing. Bye sweeties!
Sorry I‚Äôm kinda just trolling you. Sorry. :(
title: I love calm!

review: A great and much needed app!  I started using just before the pandemic and it was extremely helpful in getting me through it, and it‚Äôs continuing to help me now. There is something there for just about everyone‚Äôs needs. I just wish the sleep stories had a setting/timer ‚Äúto auto repeat‚Äù just in case I had not yet dozed off to sleep. I have to fully wake up to start the story all over again.  But again a great app!
title: A Much Needed App!!!

review:
Tamara has the perfect voice for the sleep stories and meditations. I have not been disappointed with her work and I‚Äôve been on Calm for about 2 years now!! 
There are many stars in the cast, of course. Mathew McConnaghy comes immediately to mind. Love that guys voice.
I listen to a sleep story every night. It puts me in a wonderful state of relaxation that allows me to forget about the days troubles and drift off. Most nights I don‚Äôt hear the end of the story!!
title: I love Tamara!!

review: I love the Calm app!!!  I am learning so much!  I enjoy the check-ins and all the wisdom I am gaining. I do wish that there were some things that could be read though. I work on the phone and can‚Äôt always listen to something. I would love to be able to take a moment we I am not busy between calls and read a short little bit of information, inspiration or encouragement. Thanks for listening!!
title: Maybe one suggestion‚Ä¶

review: Healing is hard and therapy is hard but good and necessary, between sessions it is been the most amazing app to use for relaxation, focus and sleep! I go to bed with anxiety EVERY night, my husband falls asleep SO fast and I was even more anxious but the nightly meditations have been a miracle! I fall asleep with no anxiety and I don‚Äôt know how it works but it does. I‚Äôm not a person that thought I could get into meditation but this app was so worth the money!
title: Working through heavy anxiety and trauma

review: Amazing app. I‚Äôve struggled with drinking for several years and one of the hardest barriers to stop the abuse was sleep. I‚Äôve always had different vices to help- music, sleep deprivation, movies, etc., but I kept finding myself in the same cycle that ended with alcohol for sleep. Anybody with a similar issue knows the struggle. I truly urge those facing the same problems to give this app a shot. It has been a monumental contribution towards the preservation of my marriage and family.
title: Calm

review: When I first opened the app, I noticed how everything was basically locked. And I wasn‚Äôt really that comfortable with paying 70 dollars a year. Luckily I was able to find a nice meditation session that helped calm myself but I felt like I wanted more. There is too much locked stuff and I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs just for me or many others are experiencing this. I would like to say the meditations are amazing and the voice was so calming. The background music is really nice and isn‚Äôt too annoying. I just wish some more things could be unlocked :)
title: Great App, Not Enough Free.

review: I love calm! Or should I say loved? Calm really helped me get better sleep with the free sleeping music that calm offered, for about 4 or 5 months and everything was going great! Until one night, I opened the app and went to start playing the free music I had saved in my library, and every single song was locked! I don‚Äôt really know why this happened but it‚Äôs really annoying knowing that calm will randomly make you purchase music that has been free for who knows how long ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
title: It was good until‚Ä¶

review:
Calm has a lot of content. Some of it is interesting and unique.  
When it comes to the meditation portions, their voice talent is often amateurish and destructing.   The delivery is stilted, the speakers sometimes pause too long between words and really take away from the calming effect that you would expect in a calming meditation.  They also, for reasons I can‚Äôt understand, have narrators who put the  accent on the wrong syllable in words.   Calm should look at the talent that they have hired.  The content is often useful, but the unprofessional and distracting narration make many of the meditations useless.
title: The app I want to love but annoys in its delivery

review: I used to use this app as a toddler teacher for nap times and now it‚Äôs very overpriced if you want to unlock all features, not even worth downloading unless you want to pay an arm and a leg for all the features. Long time free user here and what was once free is now locked and part of the paid version. App frequently crashes and freezes. The sleep timer doesn‚Äôt work, whatever is playing automatically shuts off after a minute even with a 45 minute timer set; it tells me my time ended. Used to be a great app but now just unfortunately overpriced and not the same.
title: Overpriced and not the same

review: Every day, no matter how hectic, I make the time for a daily calm or a daily trip. Very different approaches that both have allowed me to maintain this daily practice for over four years. Through these difficult times, Calm has been a lifesaver. And when sleep eludes me, a sleep story almost always does the trick. I truly love this app and have purchased a lifetime subscription so I know I will always have it to help me on this journey called life.
title: Calm is my go to app

review: I *very* rarely think it‚Äôs worth my time to write a review but I had to make an exception here. The interface is beautiful, the soundscapes are enchanting. The A-list content (e.g., kids sleep stories such as Trolls story narrated by Anna Kendrick; journey to the stars by LeVar Burton, soundscapes from Dune movie, guided narration by LeBron James, etc) were a welcome surprise. This has helped both me and my kids to calm down and sleep better at night, and I can‚Äôt wait to check out the meditation and breathing practices.
title: Love this

review:
I‚Äôve been a member of this app for almost two years.  I started using it when I was really in a time of need, felt alone, lived across the country from my family, and determined the friends I was hanging out with weren‚Äôt who I wanted to be around or identify as.  

It took a lot of time to find myself again, and I still am and always will be exploring and learning of the world from within.

Thank you calm for your impact. üôèüèº‚ù£Ô∏è
title: Best Self-Care Resource ü•∞

review: I use the Calm app everyday and I use all different features.   I‚Äôm the worst sleeper but the sleep stories have made a huge difference for me in getting to sleep and if I wake up in the middle of the night (although I don‚Äôt usually last very long before I fall asleep!). Erik Braa (spelling?) is my fave. The guided meditations are good for beginners and has a lot of variety and I‚Äôve recently been enjoying the new music addition.  Kygo Golden Hour mix is such a wonderful ending to the day. Would highly recommend.
title: Love Calm!

review: There is no option to search for help topics or reach help due to a hug in the system. When you try to enter your help request in the app, it shows only a few letters of a large awkward internal keyboard that is impossible to use or even resize, rendering typing anything impossible unless it consists entirely of q, a, z, w, s, or x. I cannot rate this highly when essential features don‚Äôt work and there is no way for me as a paying user to contact the company to report this.
title: Help doesn‚Äôt work

review: I started using this three years ago when my Mom passed away, it helped me to cope but I wasn‚Äôt consistent. I have always enjoyed the different categories and availability. Recently, I wanted to get deeper into meditation and finding overall peace. That‚Äôs when I noticed the masterclasses which is a HUGE plus for me. I‚Äôm on the ‚ÄúHow to meditate‚Äù 30 days masterclass and loving it. The app has always work really well for me on Apple with no glitches.
title: Three years user

review: I started using the app after seeing an add on tv of lebron James using it, and I decided to get it to help me focus and learn how to meditate being that I‚Äôm a young basketball player and I go through a lot of stress sometimes, thinking about games, practices and other things weather it be on or off the court, and so far it‚Äôs helped me focus and stay in the moment, and just embrace it for what it is.I‚Äôm hopping and think that this app is going to help me learn how to focus more and grow more mentally as I use it.
title: Great start

review: I was excited when I saw this app on the Today Show as I suffer from anxiety and sleep problems and was very very disappointed that the free version basically offers nothing. Please know this before you download. You don‚Äôt have access to the sleep stories except maybe two. You don‚Äôt have access to meditations other than the beginning to a series. You don‚Äôt have access to the relaxing sounds. You‚Äôre not even able to open your daily meditation. This app could be a powerful tool to those that need it, but not everyone that needs this app has the money to pay for it and I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs fair to advertise this app to people who can not afford the care.
title: Very sad and disappointed

review: I enjoy the app though still haven‚Äôt decided if it‚Äôs worth the price for me given all the free content out here today. After my year subscription I will have a better idea. It would be useful if there was the ability to do a word or tag search for content allowing me to get the most out of the app and discover additional content I‚Äôm interested. title: Search functionality

review:
As an NCC working toward licensure I couldn‚Äôt be more pleased with how this app incorporates principles like traditional mindfulness, CBT, emotional awareness, and even developmentally-appropriate courses for kids. I don‚Äôt have kids of my own but was so impressed that they break down the child meditations into 2-3 year windows.
I‚Äôve especially enjoyed the sleep meditations, the Anxiety Release, the Pain meditations, and the body scans. The emergency calm works, too! Highly, highly recommend. I just pay the $60 one time a year.
title: Calm clearly does their research

review: Calm taught me how to make meditation a daily habit-it also taught me it‚Äôs okay to miss a day or two! It acts as an anchor of confidence and well...calm in my day. I‚Äôve been using Calm personally for years and just recently started using the meditations and blog materials in my mental health non-profit curriculum. My adult students love the meditations and express that Calm makes it easy for them to dive deeper without opening old wounds. I tell everyone about this app. 100% would download again and again.
title: This is the app you‚Äôre looking for

review: This app will have a different effect on everyone, so don‚Äôt have too many expectations based on reviews. It helped and helps me a lot to one condition: doing it every single day whether I feel like it or not. It‚Äôs like going to the gym. You don‚Äôt need to pay if you don‚Äôt want to / can‚Äôt , but if 70$/year is no big deal for you, do it. I‚Äôv been using the app for 3 months and can observe some change in my daily life. Let‚Äôs see how it goes for the coming years (hopefully)...
title: Worth a trial (at least)

review: I‚Äôm the type of person who doesn‚Äôt (or didn‚Äôt) feel the desire to seek peace and calming techniques from an app. The idea was ridiculous. But then, I decided I had nothing to lose from trying. Here I am, after my first session, feeling so at ease, so focused. I‚Äôm impressed. I‚Äôll be keeping the service after my 7 day trial is up. I may even try some of these techniques with my students! Thank you to the developers of Calm for an app that has clearly been created with care and intent.
title: Skeptical at First

review: Absolutely LOVE this app. I struggle with anxiety and depression and mild sleep depreciation and this app helps me combat those experiences in a way that is putting ME IN CONTROL. Incredibly grateful for that. SO relaxing and i love the lady‚Äôs voice, especially comparable to other apps I‚Äôve tried. I also love that you can change the themes depending on your mood, which is Ofcourse ever changing. This can be used as a tool in your ‚Äúmental tool box‚Äù to keep your mind and body balanced and content. Which is what we‚Äôre all striving for right?

review: I did the free one-week trial in good faith thinking that this sounded really nice I had seen the commercials I tried it for what I thought was seven days and then I side when a couple of days over so I decided I take it for a month whenever I went into my email and checked it I found out that they had charge me for a whole year I did not click any box that said to do it for a year I have written him a letter in hopes that they will refund my money I don‚Äôt mind paying for a month but not for a year until I decide that I want to I will give you an update to what they did for now one star is too much until I hear from them let‚Äôs see how honorable they actually are. Maybe it is a mistake. Let‚Äôs hope.
title: Scammed

review: Ok so I think that this app is cool but... it mainly all is locked which means u have to pay money to unlock, and the free things are kinda boring. title: Critical

review: I‚Äôve used this for two weeks in the mornings now before getting ready for work and have been enjoying life more than ever. I‚Äôm finally becoming more contented. Learning to breath and notice our thought patterns without jumping on them for a long ride is an incredible tool psychologically, physiologically, spiritually and emotionally. I love this as a Christian but it‚Äôs not inherently religious whatsoever. I also LOVE the sounds and video scenes, which are also such a treasure to pull out from your phone and Bluetooth earpiece.
title: Wow

review: I have been using this app a little over a year now and I just need to say thank you. I  was recently diagnosed with anxiety, depression and PTSD and I can honestly say this has been my savor. If I need to get my breathing back to normal, help falling asleep or just that little recharge for the day, this has it all- so it‚Äôs an app for everyone‚Äôs benefit. Putting on one of the Relaxing tracks before bed put me in a trance of my happiest moments which I haven‚Äôt thought of in a very long time. Thank you for letting me breathe.
title: Thank you Calm

review:
Love, love, love this app! It definitely helps me with relaxing & unwinding after a stressful day. A lot of the times when I'm listening to the Daily Calm sessions I usually fall asleep while I'm listening. 

I haven't been as nervous & tensed after listening to the daily sessions which is good cause before there wasn't anything I could do to help me relax. I was as tight as a rubber band. Thanks to Facebook for suggesting your app or I would have never tried it or knew about it. Thanks again & I also love the sleep stories!!!
title: Calm

review: This app is so helpful. It is great for beginners to help you understand the method of mindful meditation and the full priced app gives you so many options for multiple types of meditation that support any need. It is the only app I use after trying several.  After trying the free version, I have purchased the full app and I find it worth every penny. There are so many different meditations that I can always find something appropriate for anything I need. I highly recommend this app.
title: Fantastic App

review: I absolutely Love "Calm!" It really gives me that much needed time to myself while being led in simple but So rewarding quiet time for me. I can focus and relax. In doing so it really allows me to hear things about me that are needed to help me to grow and be healthy. Also, I always have my phone so my "Calm" App is with me so I don't need to head to the gym, etc. I can enjoy this time where ever I am. I am still learning about "Calm" so I am sure there is much more to enjoy! Thank You So Much and God Bless You and the "Calm" team. ‚ù§Ô∏è

review: For the past few years I have done the daily trip and mr warrens meditations. It has helped me immensely focus and deal with my adhd. I now use the app for soundscapes in my ears to help concentrate on my task at hand. I am not sure why this helps but I wish all people with ADHD knew just noise can calm our brains. I recently started listening to the music as well to calm my mind. Love this app. I only wish they had a sound scape of a singing bowl every 5min to meditate to.
title: Daily trip

review: I purchased calm because I was having difficulty staying asleep. My sleep specialist has told me I have severe insomnia. Listening to  Going back to sleep has helped me to go back to sleep. I do not want to take prescription medication or over-the-counter medication to sleep. I have been using Calm for several months and I do believe my sleep is improving. I also am trying to get into the habit to do the daily meditation.

title: Amazing

review: His How to Meditate & The Daily Trip are completely different than traditional approaches to meditation.  He makes it easy, relatable and most importantly, he keeps it real. Everyone can meditate and make it work and make a difference in their own lives.  His meditations are soul food for mental health.I also find the sleep stories helpful when I‚Äôm having trouble getting to sleep.  They work for me.  Completely worth the yearly fee.
title: Jeff Warren is a game changer for meditation

review: The content of this app is beautiful and it‚Äôs great that they have a free trial so you can check it out. However, the celebrity focus is what caused me to not become a member. This will resonate with some people so that‚Äôs fantastic. For me, healthy headspace means setting apart space and time from the noise and that includes media etc. Further, the voice if one of the main narrators/teacher is grating, subjective I know but that‚Äôs why they need choice embedded. If they had options to select the instructor like other apps, that would help a great deal. Still, I couldn‚Äôt stand seeing celebrity mugs pasted across my meditation space.
title: Too celebrity focused

This honestly rages me considering I can hardly find anything to listen to. It seems as if this app could only be for the select few who can afford to pay for premium. Now, I‚Äôm sure others would disagree with claims that there are free parts of this app but I can‚Äôt find them anywhere.
title: Premium

review: I went from closing the pop up for a good year to trying the ap. I wish I had done it sooner. I am a chef/owner of restaurant in the time of Covid. Sleep and mindfulness went away in March of 2020. In the two short weeks that I have been using Calm I have slept for more than 6 hours each night, and woke feeling rested. I love the meditations, and haven‚Äôt been able to get through one story with out dozing off. Surrender to Calm. You will not regret it.
title: Hooked

review: Honestly, it's an amazing app and I adore it but can't afford to go premium at the moment. When I did have it, the app did wonders for my mental help and I'd eagerly recommend it to everyone. I have 2 favorite stories that would put me right to sleep every night and would love to be able to just have those rather than paying monthly for every available thing.
